about_the_game:
"Dami and Secret Library!"
In this game, you become Dami, a young girl on a journey to meet her late mother in a mysterious secret library.
This is a third-person 3D healing adventure set in a fairytale-like world, where players can experience Dami’s warm and emotional journey.
The game also incorporates light platformer elements, adding an extra layer of exploration and adventure.

The first episode consists of 8 levels and offers a playtime of around 15 minutes with an easy difficulty level.
Due to its short playtime, the game does not include a save or load system.
Immerse yourself in the magical library and join Dami on her heartfelt journey to recover precious memories of her mother.
Have Fun!

View more detail about the game in Store Page Trailer!

name: Dami and Secret Library

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 10 graphics adapter with 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics adapter with 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: Embark on an adventure and healing journey as Dami in a fairytale fantasy world! This third-person 3D game includes light platforming, offering exploration and fun. The first episode features 8 levels with an easy difficulty, giving around 15 minutes of playtime.
